definitions.definition: Someone, usually male, who uses (or has skill with) magic, mystic items, and magical and mystical practices.
One who is especially skilled or unusually talented in a particular field.
definitions.example: He was a financial wizard, capable of predicting the movements of the stock markets.

definitions.definition: A computer program or script used to simplify complex operations, often for an inexperienced user.
definitions.example: Use the "Add Network Connection" wizard to connect to a network in a series of simple steps.

definitions.definition: One of the administrators of a multi-user dungeon.
An adult virgin over the age of 30.
